Other ____ do ____ keep ____ zygote ____ their ____, ____ lay ____ egg. The zygote grows inside the egg until it is ready and a larva or baby animal hatches.
data.partBlankContent: Some animals keep the zygote in their bodies until it is a full-grown baby. The ti__ between t__ forming o_ the zyg___ and t__ baby's bi___ is cal___ pregnancy. Other ani____ do n__ keep t__ zygote i_ their bod___, b__ lay a_ egg. The zygote grows inside the egg until it is ready and a larva or baby animal hatches.
data.fullContent: Some animals keep the zygote in their bodies until it is a full-grown baby. The time between the forming of the zygote and the baby's birth is called pregnancy. Other animals do not keep the zygote in their bodies, but lay an egg. The zygote grows inside the egg until it is ready and a larva or baby animal hatches.
data.answer: 有些动物把受精卵留在体内，直到它长成一个完整的婴儿。受精卵形成和婴儿出生之间的这段时间称为妊娠。其他动物不把受精卵留在体内，而是产卵。受精卵在卵内生长，直到准备好并孵化出幼体或小动物。
